title: Innside Nantucket
description: Written by the author of Cheaper by the Dozen, Innside Nantucket is the story of the youngest Gilbreth son, Bob and his wife, Barbara. Told in Barbara's voice, it chronicles her introduction to Nantucket and all of the family Traditions that go with the vacation spot. After falling in love with the Island, they work towards opening an Inn. The book chronicles the many challenges of opening and running an Inn in a resort community.
author: Frank B. Gilbreth Jr.
